subject: Heads up on release timing

body.content:
Hello,

Sharing a summary and next steps below.

I refactored a couple of helpers to make the interface cleaner — shouldn’t affect your side, but call it out if anything surprises you.

For testing, I’ll start with a small cohort and track error rates, latency, and activation. If metrics look stable we can roll out to a larger slice by end of day.

  • Scope: finalize API contract (auth, pagination, errors)
  • Risks: rate limiting during onboarding, CSV import memory spikes
  • Timeline: cut beta by next Wednesday, GA in two weeks
  • Owners: backend — me; frontend — pairing with design

If anything looks off, let me know and I’ll adjust.

— Alex

On 2025-08-06T05:53:55.157000+00:00, Harper Hill <harper.hill+36@testdomain.com> wrote:
> Hi,
>
> Following up with a few details from our chat.
>
> We aligned on the core requirements and trimmed a few nice‑to‑have items so we can hit the target date. I included concrete examples for the payloads so we avoid ambiguity later.
>
> - Scope: finalize API contract (auth, pagination, errors)
> - Risks: rate limiting during onboarding, CSV import memory spikes
> - Timeline: cut beta by next Wednesday, GA in two weeks
> - Owners: backend — me; frontend — pairing with design
>
> If anything looks off, let me know and I’ll adjust.
